content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 12 Aug 2018Which equity or bond is best for investment using SRS account?Too many options to choose from. SRS doesn't allow ETF so only options I see, opt for Equity or bonds but those are somewhere 100 or so. Sorry, I have very basic knowledge about investment and currently have RSP with DBS for STI ETF. But Interested in using SRS money to invest into something. My risk profile is moderate.3 answersAnswerBump1
